text: Eoacmaea pustulata is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eoacmaeidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Caribbean Sea and in the Gulf of Mexico. ==References== * Turgeon, D.D., et al. 1998. Common and scientific names of aquatic invertebrates of the United States and Canada. American Fisheries Society Special Publication 26 page(s): 56 File:Patelloida pustulata 001.jpg|side view File:Patelloida pustulata 002.jpg|basal view Category:Eoacmaeidae Category:Molluscs described in 1779
title: Eoacmaea pustulata
